sentences.en: Efface the footprints in the sands.
He could not efface the impression from his mind.
sentences.cn: 他不能把这个印象从心中抹去.

sentences.en: He would have to efface himself before his visitors.
sentences.cn: 他每每只好在客人面前躲而避之.

sentences.en: Nothing can efface the last picture I have of them from my mind.
sentences.cn: 没有什么能抹去他们在我脑海中留下的最后印象。

sentences.en: She would efface herself before her visitor.
sentences.cn: 她宁愿避而不见来访者.

sentences.en: Shriley did her best to efface herself at parties.
sentences.cn: 雪莉参加聚会时竭力不露面.

sentences.en: The lapse of year will never efface that scene of ruins from my memory.
sentences.cn: 时光的流逝绝不会把那废墟的景象从我的记忆中冲淡.

sentences.en: Time and weather have long ago efface the inscription on the monument.
sentences.cn: 岁月和风雨早已磨掉纪念碑上的铭文.

sentences.en: You make me want to efface your name from that shiny award plaque.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃说,“你烦的我真想把你的名字从闪闪的获奖金匾上擦去. ”

words.tran_cn: 能擦掉的；可抹去的；会被忘却的

trans.tran_cn: 擦掉，抹去，超越，使黯然失色
